name: Hampton Inn by Hilton Kamloops

reviews.text: We stayed here on our way to Vancouver, had everything we needed with clean quiet rooms, a nice sized pool and a good 'standard fare' hotel breakfast buffet. Would definitely stay again.
reviews.title: Great Stop Over

reviews.text: We stayed at this hotel as a stopover driving from Vancouver to Jasper. Quite, comfortable beds, clean, excellent staff.
reviews.title: Excellent stopover going to/from Alberta

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My wife and I stayed at the Hampton Inn in Kamloops on our way through Canada on a recent vacation. We had booked our stay through Hilton Honors and I used points to pay for the room.
reviews.title: Nice!

reviews.text: The hotel was nice, clean and well located. There were several restaurants and bars nearby. Parking was especially easy as they have numerous covered spaces right along the front of the hotel.
reviews.title: A real find in Kamloops

reviews.text: Upon our arrival, the single hotel elevator was out of service which was causing a bit a a disruption for the solo desk clerk on a Sunday afternoon. Many of the arriving guest's rooms (including ours) were reserved on the 4th floor. This made for a quite a trek up the stairs, hauling bags, coolers, etc.
reviews.title: Excellent hotel at a good price

reviews.text: Excelent hotel located near Transcanada Highway. Very friendly staff. Very good breakfast buffet - complimentary. Nice rooms. Very convenient to stop there if you driving to the the Rockies.
reviews.title: Very good deal if you're driving to the Rockies.
Perfect stop over
reviews.text: We stayed here for one night as stop over between Whistler and Jasper. Ideal for a stop over. Nice, clean hotel with really helpful staff and the bonus of a swimming pool for a refreshing swim. We ate in a local restaurant within walking distance. Important to note it is on outskirts and located in an area of hotels with large car parks etc kind of like a retail park at home but perfect for our purposes.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My wife and I stayed at the Hampton Inn on a two night stopover between Canmore & Mount Robson. The hotel was ideally situated with excellent access to the highway with free parking and a good variety of restaurants within very easy walking distance to suit all tastes and budgets. If you only stay here one night you must try out the Ora restaurant situated in the Towne Lodge hotel opposite. It is a real hidden gem with a lovely veranda overlooking the City and mountains with a very good choice and affordable menu, made even more affordable if you pick up a discount card from the Hampton Inn receptionist. Our only criticism is that each morning we had to eat our breakfast with plasticised dishes, plates, cups and crockery. It took a slight edge of of what could make this hotel an excellent hotel.
reviews.title: EXCELLENT STOP OVER BETWEEN CANMORE & MOUNT ROBSON

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Stopped here on the way from Whistler to Banff. Service was excellent, front desk staff very friendly and helpfull. Rooms clean and comfortable but a little dull. Free internet and parking a big plus, breakfast also good. Location ok, not much around though. Special mention for Carolyn Anderson who organised a next day courier for my glasses to be sent onto Banff as I had left them behind, really did avoid a potentially stressful situation and a great example of the great customer sevice they provide at the Hampton.
reviews.title: Recommended

reviews.text: Our family stopped at the Hampton Inn Kamloops on a one night stopover from Vancouver to Jasper. We booked the advance rate online through the hotel website. The room rate was slightly high, but included an excellent hot breakfast (waffles / eggs / sausage / coffee / pastries / etc) and free wireless internet. Hotel staff was polite and helpful, with no problems checking in (except they were down to one last cookie). Rooms were clean and common areas were in good condition. The hotel is easy to get to and located close to food and other lodgings. Overall a comfortable stay. Would return next time we are in the area.
reviews.title: Good place to stay in Kamloops

reviews.text: The hotel is very new looking, clean with nice decor. The rooms are spacious and comfortable, with good air con.
reviews.title: Great place to stay in Kamloops - and it has a water slide

reviews.text: The pool is nice, not too cold but just right after a hot day. The hot tub isnt too hot or filled with chlorine like many others, so it's very relaxing. And the water slide is awesome, even for us adults.
reviews.title: Disappointed

reviews.text: The only problem is that the location is a little out of the centre of the city. But there is a great view to make up for it. And there are a plenty of places to eat with a reasonable short walk.
reviews.title: Good hotel - we'd stay again

reviews.text: Overall it's a really good place to stay.
reviews.title: Great place, wonderful staff, comfortable surroundings!

reviews.text: After reading several good reviews here we decided to stay here on our trip from Vancouver to Alberta. I generally like all Hilton branded hotels, including Hampton Inns. This one is conveniently located off the Transcanada Highway, it has a very nice lobby , rooms are clean and it has a nice pool area. Otherwise, staff were curt and the room was noisy as we could hear folks moving around in other rooms. We did not have a good sleep. The soundproofing seems non-existant between rooms, to the point that when the folks in the room above started moving around at 5am, it woke me up. For the price you can do far better elsewhere. As I say, I typically like all Hilton branded hotels, but will stay elsewhere next time when travelling through Kamloops to get a good night's sleep.
reviews.title: Another wonderful visit - the standards here are high!
NO CATS ALLOWED!!! DISCRIMINATION
reviews.text: They claim this hotel is pet friendly. WTF!!! Cats are pets, duh!!! Only dogs are allowed. This makes me just livid. All cat lovers avoid this place!!

reviews.title: Excellent value
reviews.text: Stayed at Hampton In K amloops. Will not stay in any other hotel in Kamloops. Great service and amazing cookies! Loved the room. Stayed a night before in the Delta Grand - Kelowna for way more $$ and it was terrible.
Highly recommend this hote. Will be back.
reviews.title: Great Stay! Great Business Hotel!

reviews.text: I travel quite a bit on business and this hotel provided excpetional service, rooms, and amenities! The front desk staff was extremely professional and helpful. The rooms were clean and spacious. Business centre was perfect for some last minute printing! Would highly recommend this for any business travellers!
reviews.title: Fantastic place to stay!!

reviews.text: Let me start out by saying I am an EXTREMELY picky person when it comes to hotels. We came to Kamloops for a week and stayed here. Immediately the staff were very warm and welcoming. We stayed on the 4th floor, overlooking the city and if it weren't for all the snow, it would have been a breath taking view.
reviews.title: When traveling with kids - this is a good spot

aka: Hampton Inn By Hilton Kamloops Hotel Kamloops
description: Relax at Hampton Inn by Hilton Kamloops, British Columbia, Canada, and enjoy a refreshing countryside suburban retreat with a choice of facilities included in your stay. Set just 20 minutes from Kamloops Airport, this hotel is conveniently located close to a major highways, only ten minutes from downtown Kamloops. Explore breathtaking scenery, discover an outdoor adventure with skiing or golfing, or treat yourself at Aberdeen Mall, just a short walk from this Kamloops hotel. Unwind and recharge in a comfortable Guest Room with a fresh bed and free high-speed internet access. Upgrade to a spacious suite and make yourself at home with a microwave oven and refrigerator. Wake up with a Hampton’s Free Hot Breakfast or grab a breakfast-to-go bag from Monday to Friday at the Front Desk. Sip on complimentary tea and coffee in the cozy hotel lobby and stay in touch with free WiFi in public areas. Catch up with work in the 24-hour business center or re-energize with a workout in the fitness center. Plunge into the indoor pool, splash around on the waterslide, or bathe in the whirlpool.
